meanings.definition: A type of plant with edible leaves and roots.
meanings.sent1: The farmer grew rampions in his garden for their tasty leaves and roots.
meanings.sent2: I added some fresh rampions to my salad for extra flavor.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous rabbit snuck into the garden and nibbled on the rampions, thinking they were carrots.
meanings.sent4: Her hair was as wild and untamed as a field of rampions blowing in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant green color of the rampions stood out against the brown soil.
